Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 7th overall pick, by Boston in 1979...
Injured on 9/6/1979 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 5/7/1983 with a Bruised Hand, out for 5 days...
Injured on 5/19/1985 with a Pulled Hamstring Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 8/24/1985 with a Bruised Foot, out for 4 days...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1986, off Jay Franklin (MIN)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/2/1986, off Victor Cruz (MIN)...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 1986, hitting .307 with 28 HR, 87 RBI...
Won Gold Glove Award at First Base in 1986...

Had 6 hits with 3 RBI against Baltimore on 5/10/1988...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/12/1988, hitting .600 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...

Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against California on 7/16/1988...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/21/1988, hitting .600 with 2 HR, 5 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Cleveland on 4/14/1990...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/7/1991, hitting .500 with 5 HR, 13 RBI...
Won Gold Glove Award at First Base in 1991...
Hit for the cycle against New York (A) on 6/8/1992...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against New York (A) on 6/8/1992...
Injured on 8/24/1992 with a Hyper Extended Knee, out for one week...
Injured on 4/2/1993 with a Jammed Finger, out for one week...

Had 21-game hitting streak snapped on 9/27/1993...
Won Gold Glove Award at First Base in 1993...
Hit 3 homeruns against Chicago (A), driving in 6 runs on 4/8/1995...
Released by Boston on 6/16/1996...
